data.name: trip=true
data.detailed_description:
Joys and Kessy chose drugs and alcohol over fixing their lives. Waking up on Monday they realize, that they can't remember anything before this day. The inner fear of heroines kicks of their journey of discovery, but all they find is more troubles.


This game is a visual novel, where you choose which of girl's stories you want to read first. During the game you will face different choices, some of which may have huge consequences! Only after reading through Joys and Kessy's perspective you will unlock the true ending.


• Same story – different perspective. Find out what really happened before Monday by looking on this set of events from perspective of both Joys and Kessy.
• Choices have consequences. You'll never know what may lead to bad end!
• Not only pain, but love as well. The game contains different sex scenes.

data.short_description: A short visual novel about two girls, who lost the memory about past few days.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 260 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

highlighted.name: That's not the way to say thank you

content_descriptors.notes: Warning! This game contains foul language, sexual assault, drug and alcohol abuse, self-harm and suicide! It is not recommended for people with mental health problems.
